import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; const ProductScreen = () => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0) const {id} = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails; useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) },[ dispatch, id]) return ( <> Go Back {loading ? () : error ? ({error} ): (

{product.name}

 מחיר: ${product.price} {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'זמין במלאי' : 'חסר במלאי'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty { setQty(e.target.value)}}> [...] )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
